items.sentence: You shouldn\'t have told him about the plan.
Tom usually takes a shower before breakfast.
Tom wanted to find a way to fix the problem.
Tom wanted to listen to something by Mozart.
Tom wanted to turn himself in to the police.
Tom wants desperately to do the right thing.
I don\'t think it\'s Tom who\'s the problem.
You\'re wondering why I did it, aren\'t you?
You\'ve already had breakfast, haven\'t you?
You\'ve been here a long time, haven\'t you?
You\'ve been to Boston before, haven\'t you?
Tom should\'ve invited Mary, but he didn\'t.
It takes over 40 minutes to boil an emu egg.
It was you that suggested seeing that movie.
Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.
Your wife is going to ask you for a divorce.
I\'m glad it\'s not coming out of my pocket.
Tom quit his job to travel around the world.
Tom said he had plenty of friends in Boston.
Tom says he has enough money to buy a house.
